verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>. His foundation <WH3248> is in the holy <WH6944> mountains <WH2042>.
The YY <WH3068> loveth <WH157> <WH8802> the gates <WH8179> of TZiyon <WH6726> more than all the dwellings <WH4908> of Ya`akov <WH3290>.
Glorious things <WH3513> <WH8737> are spoken <WH1696> <WH8794> of thee, O city <WH5892> of 'Elohim <WH430>. Selah <WH5542>.

I will make mention <WH2142> <WH8686> of Rachav <WH7294> and Babylon <WH894> to them that know <WH3045> <WH8802> me: behold Philistia <WH6429>, and TZor <WH6865>, with Ethiopia <WH3568>; this man was born <WH3205> <WH8795> there.
And of TZiyon <WH6726> it shall be said <WH559> <WH8735>, This and that man <WH376> was born <WH3205> <WH8795> in her: and the highest <WH5945> himself shall establish <WH3559> <WH8787> her.
The YY <WH3068> shall count <WH5608> <WH8799>, when he writeth up <WH3789> <WH8800> the people <WH5971>, that this man was born <WH3205> <WH8795> there. Selah <WH5542>.
As well the singers <WH7891> <WH8802> as the players <WH2490> <WH8802> on instruments shall be there: all my springs <WH4599> are in thee.
